title: Error 004 when on OCE client
body:
Whenever I try to download the patch it comes up with error 004 "Patching failed and we're not sure why".

THIS ONLY HAPPENS WHEN CLIENT IS ON OCEANIA.

When I switched over to NA and EU West it downloaded as normally, but I'm from Australia so I'm obviously not going to use these servers. When I switched it back to Oceania it came up with the same error.

replies.body:
Hi guys, 

I have had the same issue. I have worked through Riot's official support channels to no avail (not from lack of effort from Riot). However, the problem seems to localized to Optus users. Are you guys all on optus as well?

Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.

I reckon it's something to do with Riot's servers. When I download the patch on EU West or NA, its fine, but when I go back to Oceania it comes up with the same error 004.

P.S. the Initiate Full Repair doesn't help either.

Then submit a ticket. If there's an active issue and they don't know about it, then they'll see the tickets coming in and investigate. If they do know then they can usually give you a local solution or an ETA on a fix. If it's something with your client specifically, they can help you isolate the problem and get it sorted out.
I'm having a similiar issue with a DL to a new PC. "Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again. (Error code 004)"
